segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and he doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right under their mother’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the floor is a disaster, but the kids are only focused on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, I’m surprised he hasn’t fallen already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like she’s waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip, but it’s only a matter of time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a risky situation, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
